# Search N Act

[github](https://github.com/eaybek/sna/) 
[PyPi](https://pypi.org/project/sna/)  
[Jupyter Notebook Viewer](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/eaybek/sna/blob/master/sample.ipynb)  

you can do:  
    search and replace  
    search and create  
    search and open  
    search and anything...
